EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.WashingtonDC_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Wednesday, 19 April 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
EMC EBC 8444 Westpark Drive, McLean, VA 22102 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/8444+Westpark+Dr,+McLean,+VA+22102/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b64af442c143f3:0x9d413431b541e06d?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwihq_6jgpLSAhWl5IMKHagbCa8Q8gEIGzAA]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/washingtondc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
